Name: Vondelpark3

Name: Vondelpark3

Name: Vondelpark3

Review Text: I've been to this restaurant several times and really love the food and menu, albeit overpriced. Name: Vondelpark3

Name: Vondelpark3
Review Text: Very nice view from the terrace. Very creative and useful way to order things - by app! Orders are served very quick. Pancakes with syrup are AMAZING! Beef carpaccio is ok. The restaurant isn't very expensive, even though the food is tasty. I can really recommennd it to others.

Name: Vondelpark3
Review Text: Had dinner with colleague's here. It was average. Service was slow.

Name: Vondelpark3
Review Text: Well. In the greatest park on this planet there is a little place where you can go to grab a few drinks and some snacks. Didn't try their food to be honest but it's location cannot be described. You have o experience it! Amazing place. Will definitely be back soon

Name: Vondelpark3

Name: Vondelpark3

The restaurant was rather full, so they might have been low on staff. Food was still excellent, but if you don't have a lot of time to spare, try somewhere else.

Name: Vondelpark3

Name: Vondelpark3

Name: Vondelpark3

Very unprofessional. I save only the food quality, which is decent.

Name: Vondelpark3
Review Text: The food is good, and the seating downstairs has a great view. But the service downstairs is appalling. People sat at tables can be left waiting for 10 minutes before being served.

Name: Vondelpark3
Review Text: Really nice park there's several spots to chill, and various places to eat all around the park, if you are on vacations on Amsterdam this is a place to visit.

Name: Vondelpark3
Review Text: Great glühwein. Self service on top terrace but not the bottom, which wasn't at all clear. Dirty table. A bit too loud music in the bar for a relaxed afternoon drink.

Name: Vondelpark3
Review Text: Pretty fantastic place to have a drink on a warm summer’s day. Beautiful spot, great terrace, wide variety of drinks and food.

Name: Vondelpark3
Review Text: Terrible service had to wait 15 to 20 mins just to get the servers attention. Then another 10 to 15 to make an order. A lot better places to eat in Amsterdam!

Name: Vondelpark3
Review Text: After being served my lunch along with collegues, I continued working by myself at the large table in the middle. For over 2,5 HOURS I was not asked anything, if everything was ok or if I would like another drink. There were 5 personnel and it was super calm so there is no excuse here. Completely unacceptable.

Name: Vondelpark3
Review Text: The vondelpark is an ABSOLUTE must see. It is fantastic. I gave it 4 stars because EVERYONE visits it, and it is too busy for my liking, especially in spring and summer. Try the Flevopark for some more space!

Name: Vondelpark3
Review Text: Very expensive, 9€ for a weizenbier!!! The Food is ok but the service really slow and make us feel not welcome at all. we felt like a tourist trap.

Name: Vondelpark3
Review Text: If you are celiac do not eat the lemon cheesecake, it says glutenfree on the menu,  waiter  assured me it was safe, I' ve got very, very sick from it (date 7 July around 12,30 pm)

Name: Vondelpark3
Review Text: Nice place but we had to order the drinks three times until we got them. Traces of red lipstick on the class. But finally an excuse!

Name: Vondelpark3
Review Text: You're paying an upcharge for the location and nothing else. Food is quite mediocre and the servers range from indifferent to openly rude. What a pity as it's a beautiful location in Vondelpark.

Name: Vondelpark3
